name: thalo
description: - Initialize a knowledge base with `thalo init` to generate `entities.thalo`, `AGENTS.md`, and `personal-bio.md`. - Add or edit entries in `*.thalo` files or fenced code blocks inside Markdown (lang: `thalo`). - Validate after changes with `thalo check` to catch schema, link, and syntax issues. - Format with `thalo format` when preparing a commit or cleanup (or use Prettier with the plugin) - Run `thalo actualize` to materialize syntheses (queries + prompt) for LLM use.
author: rejot-dev
